info.name: Nextcloud Video Player
info.description:
A responsive video player using a skinned version of Video.js.
*(Modified from official version)*
**Based on this app:**
https://github.com/nextcloud/files_videoplayer
**Video.js:**
http://videojs.com/
**Skin:**
https://www.scriptsmashup.com/Video_Skin_Generator/Videojs/videojs-skin-generator.html
info.author: Baozisoftware
